text:
To be placed on the next Pkg call agenda (probably next week, unless <@U6795JH6H>/<@U67D54KS8>/<@U67SCG4HG> are bored and want to have one today?): Fons is working through a Pkg/Project.toml GUI integration for Pluto [0] and would like to brainstorm with us to figure out the best way to do it.  I find the screenshot very exciting, so let’s talk it through!

[0] <https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl/pull/661>
